measure2CmdHdr.Title: Measure
measure2CmdHdr.ShortHelp: Measures objects or the distance between objects.
measure2CmdHdr.LongHelp: Click two points on the model to measure the distance between them. You can only create one measure at a time.
measure3CmdHdr.Title: Measure
measure3CmdHdr.ShortHelp: Allows to measure position, length, area, volume...
measureCmdHdr.Title: Measure
measureCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Measures different parameters of an object as well as parameters between two objects.
measureCmdHdr.LongHelp:
1. Select the geometry types in filters.
  2. Click the objects required for the measurement.
  3. Click Repeat to measure multiple objects in succession.
measure2DCmdHdr.Title: Measure
measure2DCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Measures objects or the distance between objects.
measure2DCmdHdr.LongHelp:
1. Click the objects required for the measurement.
  2. Click Repeat to measure multiple objects in succession.
thicknessCmdHdr.Title: Measure Thickness
thicknessCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Measures the thickness of an object.
thicknessCmdHdr.LongHelp:
1. Click the surface of the item to measure its thickness.
  2. Hovering over surfaces displays a preview of items' thickness, and highlights the surfaces involved in the measurement.

measurePointPointCmdHdr.Title: Measure
measurePointPointCmdHdr.ShortHelp: To measures distance between two points.
measurePointPointCmdHdr.LongHelp: 1. Click the objects required for the measurement.
DMUMeasureCoordinatesCmdHdr.Title: Measure Coordinates
DMUMeasureCoordinatesCmdHdr.LongHelp:
1. You can select only points.
  2. Either an existing point on the model,
  3. or any point on the model you click.
DMUMeasureLengthCmdHdr.Title: Measure Length
DMUMeasureLengthCmdHdr.LongHelp: 1. You can select only edge geometry i.e., Line, Curve or arc

DMUMeasureVolumeCmdHdr.Title: Measure Volume
DMUMeasureDiameterRadiusCmdHdr.Title: Measure Diameter/Radius
DMUMeasureDiameterRadiusCmdHdr.LongHelp: 1. You can select only Arc or Circle.

DMUMeasureAngleCmdHdr.LongHelp: 1. You can select only geometry where angle is possible
